meanings.sent1: The leafleters handed out flyers on the street.
meanings.sent2: The leafleters are promoting the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The leafleters joked about having paper cuts from all the flyers.
meanings.sent4: The leafleters were like busy bees spreading information everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The leafleters wore bright vests to stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: The leafleters' job involves giving out papers to passersby.
meanings.sent2: Leafleting is an effective way to raise awareness.
meanings.sent3: The leafleters practiced their leafleting skills in the park.
meanings.sent4: The leafleting campaign flooded the town with information.
meanings.sent5: The leafleters' enthusiasm for leafleting was contagious.

meanings.definition: The group of people who distribute leaflets.
meanings.sent1: The leafleters gathered at the corner to start their distribution.
meanings.sent2: The leafleters worked together to cover the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The leafleters formed a club dedicated to spreading messages.
meanings.sent4: The leafleters were a well-oiled machine of information dissemination.
meanings.sent5: The leafleters' unity made their cause impossible to ignore.
